summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Sol I11ERN Financial LLC at Deutsche Bank for January 2018. It details deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant outgoing transfers to various entities, including a substantial transfer to Coatue Enterprises LLC and Lawrence P. Vlososki.

Sol I11ERN Financial LLC transferred funds to Coatue Enterprises LLC.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfers
events.description: Multiple outgoing money transfers were made from the account, including significant amounts to Coatue Enterprises LLC and Lawrence P. Vlososki.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document summarizes account activity for Sol I11ERN Financial LLC for January 2018.
The account had a beginning balance of $35,725.00 and an ending balance of $387,695.00.
Significant outgoing transfers included $500,000.00 to Coatue Enterprises LLC and $150,000.00 to Lawrence P. Vlososki.
Service charges for the statement period totaled $50.00.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
